Text:
...and don't forget to pop along to the numerous websites that dismantle Hansen's claims quite methodically.

http://wattsupwiththat.com/  is a reasonable place to start.

The CO2 emissions theory of climate change is a load of total bollocks bought about by simple cunts like Al Gore to make us pay them carbon tax to save the planet.  It's political rubbish at best and total fraud and deception in reality.
CO2 is modeled because current science can not handle models for water vapor but just try to explain that to some concerned person who has been driven to panic by Hansen and his type.
Google 'dead97gsx' .  This guy is a zero.  Does zero with his life so he tears down the work of others so that it seems that he is something.
